name: device_open
description: This function is used to open a SmartThings device to a specified percentage.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to open.

parameters.name: ration
parameters.description: The percentage to open the device.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number to open the device.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action to perform on the devices.
